meanings.sent1: I love the unique typestyle used in that book.
meanings.sent2: The typestyle of the magazine caught my eye.
meanings.sent3: The typestyle on the menu made the food look even tastier.
meanings.sent4: Her handwriting had a typestyle that was elegant and flowing.
meanings.sent5: The typestyle of the logo made it instantly recognizable.

meanings.definition: The style or appearance of printed matter.
meanings.sent1: The typestyle of the poster was bold and attention-grabbing.
meanings.sent2: I like the typestyle of this newspaper.
meanings.sent3: The typestyle of the flyer made me want to read it twice.
meanings.sent4: The typestyle of the invitation was so fancy, it looked like a royal decree.
meanings.sent5: The typestyle of the book cover hinted at the story inside.
